headline.main: U.S. SHIP ACTION PLEASES RUSSIANS; Chief Effect for the Soviet in Neutrality Changes Is Seen in Aid to British Ally

lead_paragraph: KUIBYSHEV, Russia, Nov. 15 (Delayed) -- Enactment of the changes in the United States Neutrality Act was welcomed here as another and tighter link in the chain being forged around Germany.
abstract: On U S Neutrality Act revision
snippet: KUIBYSHEV, Russia, Nov. 15 (Delayed) -- Enactment of the changes in the United States Neutrality Act was welcomed here as another and tighter link in the chain being forged around Germany....

byline.original: Wireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES
